channel.title: Npcs and fish

item.title: Npcs and fish
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

i decided to start anew on shops in my server so i deleted all of the shops in shops.cfg and i got rid of all the wanneshop things i then added in a shop to shops.cfg and i put this in for wanneshop

} else if (NPCID == 2790) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;

this, according to every tut ive read about making shops should make a shop but instead. when i click talk to npc it gives me a fish!!!

btw i got backups of the old shops =)

Read full topic
